title: Renovated/Large 3 bed + 1 bath Duplex
posting_body: Fully renovated 3 BR, 1 BA large (1300 sq. ft.)
upper unit in Pingree Park neighborhood!
Original hardwood floors, fresh paint, updated appliances, and all-new fixtures.
Bonus sun room and beautifully tiled shower with bath tub.

Amenities include off-street parking, a washer and dryer, and proximity to local attractions such as Pingree Park, the Commons coffee shop, gym (Detroit Body Garage), and a high-performing public-charter school (Detroit Prep).
Open side lot right next door.
Utilities are the responsibility of the tenant.
